terms: ** Below is a brief summary as of the date of this Option of certain United States federal tax consequences of exercise of this nonqualified stock option and disposition of the Shares under the laws in effect as of the Grant Date. THIS SUMMARY IS INCOMPLETE, AND THE TAX LAWS AND REGULATIONS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE. OPTIONEE SHOULD CONSULT A TAX ADVISER BEFORE EXERCISING THIS OPTION OR DISPOSING OF THE SHARES.**

** Foster Wheeler AG, a Swiss company (the “Company”), hereby grants to  (“Optionee”), an option (the “Option”) to purchase the total number of registered shares (the “Shares”) subject to the Option, set forth in the Notice of Employee Nonqualified Stock Option Grant (the “Notice”), at the exercise price per Share set forth in the Notice (the “Exercise Price”), subject to the terms, definitions and provisions of the Foster Wheeler AG Omnibus Incentive Plan (the “Plan”) adopted by the Company, which is [[Option Agreement]] in this Employee Nonqualified Stock Option Agreement (the “Option Agreement”) by reference. Unless otherwise defined in this Option Agreement, the terms used in this Option Agreement shall have the meanings defined in the Plan; *
**Applicable if Optionee is a UK person****
**Applicable if Optionee is not a US person (including as to UK persons)****
**By: Raymond J. Milchovich Its: Chairman & CEO**
**Exercise Notice of Options of Foster Wheeler AG**
**Notice of Employee Nonqualified Stock Option Grant**
**Termination as a Result of Death or Disability****
**Termination as a Result of Involuntary Termination or Resignation for Good Reason****
**Termination of Relationship; Vesting Acceleration on Certain Events****
**Total Number of Shares Subject to this Option:**
